question: What is PoolPay?
answer: PoolPay is a group payments platform, wherein you pool money into a common digital wallet with your peers. The funds can be collectively used for all your group related payments. These payments take place via your very own Rupay Virtual Card.

question: Why PoolPay?
answer:
1. You only pay for your share
2. Skip awkwardness around money.
3. Easy tracking of expenses

question: What can I use PoolPay for?
answer:
You can use PoolPay to do a ton of useful things -
1. Create an expense group with your friends which also doubles down as a shared wallet.
2. Track, make and settle group related payments from your shared digital wallet.
3. Track and make personal payments.
4. Split one time bill payments using our QuickSplit feature.
5. Save money through great offers, cashbacks and rewards through card payments.

question: What makes PoolPay unique?
answer: While other apps rely on manual entry of expenses and inefficient ways to settle payments, PoolPay allows you to reduce this work by giving you and your friends a shared digital wallet that can be used to make all payments that are common amongst the group members.

question: Is PoolPay free?
answer: Yes! the service is completely free. You also get a free virtual card on successful registration.

question: Where can I find the app?
answer: PoolPay is available for download on iOS App Store and Google Play Store

question: Why is registration important?
answer:
Registering on the app helps you and your friends identify each other and helps us keep your data secure.
The KYC process, as mandated by RBI, also helps avoid misappropriation of funds.

question: What does the registeration and KYC process look like?
answer:
We will ask you for your phone number and other basic details like name, gender, date of birth, address, employment status (which needs to be filled as per the information given in your PAN and Aadhaar card) to complete your registeration on the app.
We will then require you to verify your PAN number so we can complete Min KYC for your account.
Post completion of Min KYC, we will ask you to upgrade your account to Full KYC so that you can use the app as per RBI guidelines. The Full KYC process involves accessing your information from CKYC database, Aadhaar verification, selfie verification and a penny drop.
After all the submitted information is verified, your account will be upgraded to Full KYC status and you can then proceed to use the PoolPay app.

question: I am facing an issue while submitting my KYC
answer: Please reach out to us at support@poolpay.in with details for the same and we will help you out.

question: Where can I find my virtual card details?
answer: Virtual Card details can be found on the app home screen. The front of the card shows the wallet/ group balance. The back side of the card has the card number, cvv, expiry date and name of the card holder. You can flip the card via a tab on the top right corner of the card.

question: How do I use my virtual card for payments?
answer:
1. On the home screen click on the menu just below the wallet balance to select the group you would like to activate payments for.
2. Once the desired group is activated, copy the card details enter them on the checkout screen of the app/website where you wish to make the payment.
3. Once you enter the otp during the payment process, the payment via the card will be complete. 
4. The new group/ personal wallet balance will be reflected on the app.

question: Can I get multiple virtual cards?
answer:
As per RBI guidelines only one card can be issued for each user.
On PoolPay, you can use the same card to seamlessly pay from all your group wallets as well as your personal wallet. The card can be activated for a particular group via the card activation feature.

question: How long will my card be active for a group after activation?
answer: The card will be active for a group until you explicitly change it to another group or to your personal wallet.

question: Someone besides me has gotten access to my card information. What do I do?
answer:
Head over to the "Card Controls" section under "Profile and Settings" and lock your card.
After locking your card, please reach out to us at support@poolpay.in and we will help you block your card and report any unauthorised transaction.

question: How do I deposit money into a group wallet?
answer: You can deposit money in a group wallet via your personal PoolPay wallet.

question: How do I load money into my personal wallet?
answer: You can deposit money into your personal wallet via any UPI app of your choice

question: Who has access to the group wallet funds?
answer: All members of the group can make use of the funds available in the group wallet. Only add people to the group who are trsutworthy and with whom you are comfortable sharing your money with.

question: How do I make a payment via a group wallet?
answer:
1. On the home screen click on the menu just below the wallet balance to select the group you would like to activate payments for.
2. Once the desired group is activated, copy the card details enter them on the checkout screen of the app/website where you wish to make the payment.
3. Once you enter the otp during the payment process, the payment via the card will be complete. 
4. The new group/ personal wallet balance will be reflected on the app.

question: Can I also record payments that were not made via the app?
answer: Yes you can! You can manually add details of payments via other means. You can even choose the payment split for the group members involved and add additonal details that will make settling the payments easier.

question: I made a group payment but i would like to change the individual split of the members. How can i do that?
answer:
1. Find the transaction bubble in the group chat section.
2. Click on it to view all the details of that group payment. 
3. In that screen, you will find an edit button on the top right corner. click on it.
4. You will now be able to change the list of members involved, their individual share for the payment, payment category etc.

question: Someone is abusing/harassing me on the group chat or is indulging in hate speech.
answer: Safety is our top priority. Please write to support@poolpay.in with screenshots and details. We will be quick to initiate the necessary actions.

question: I would like to update my phone number/ email id.
answer: Please reach out to us at support@poolpay.in and we will assist you with the same.

question: I would like to delete my account.
answer: We are sorry to see you go! Please reach out to us at support@poolpay.in and we will assist you with the same. Please not that before we can proceed with account deletion, you must clear all pending payments and settle up all the card and cash related payments in each group you are a part of. We may retain some user information as per guidelines set by RBI.

question: I would like to report a bug.
answer: Please reach out to us at support@poolpay.in with relevant screenshots and details and we will fix it up asap!

question: How do I reset my password?
answer: There is no password reset option as we only provide an OTP login. If you feel that your account has been compromised, write to us at support@poolpay.in and we can temporarily block payments from your account. We can also assist you with changing the phone number associated with your account.

question: Help, I can't log in to my account!
answer: Please check if you are entering the correct phone number. In case you are still not able to log in, contact support@poolpay.in with all details and necessary screenshots and we will look into it.

question: Help, my balances are wrong!
answer:
Please restart the app or check again after some time. Any recent transactions may take time to update on the app incase you are on a slow network.
If you are still having any issues, please write to support@poolpay.in and we will look into the issue.

question: Who can see my expenses and balances? How do I keep certain expenses and balances private?
answer: Everyone who is a part of the group can see the group expenses and balances. However, in your personal wallet, the balances and expenses will be private.

question: Are there any kind of limits on payments made via the app?
answer:
As Per RBI Guidelines, the following limits apply for Full KYC wallets -

Account Balance                Rs. 2,00,000
Monthly Spend                No Limit
Annual Spend                No Limit
Per Transaction                Rs. 2,00,000

Apart from the above mentioned limits, we have also set a Rs. 3,00,000 daily spend limit.
We also provide you with the option to change the per transaction limit to an amount that you are more comfortable with.

Please note that these limits are applicable on your overall deposits and payments across your PoolPay account and not just on your personal wallet.

question: What is Poolcoins?
answer: PoolCoins is an in-app currency on the PoolPay app.

question: How do I earn Poolcoins?
answer:
You can earn Poolcoins in multiple ways -
1. Invite your friends onto the app and earn on every successful referral.
2. On every payment made via the PoolPay card, you earn cashbacks in the from of Poolcoins (Coming Soon).
3. You can also earn poolcoins by completing certain tasks on the app (Coming Soon).

question: What can I do with my Poolcoins?
answer:
You can convert your Poolcoins to Indian Rupee! 250 Poolcoins = 1 INR. This money will be deposited into your personal wallet.
Please note that you need to have atleast 30,000 Poolcoins before you can convert them and these Poolcoins should have been earned atleast 10 days prior to the time of conversion.

question: What is PoolPay's Referral Program?
answer: Existing PoolPay users can earn rewards when new users join the PoolPay app using their referral code. The new users earn a reward as well!

question: What are the rewards on each referral?
answer: Details for the rewards can be found on the referral page of the app.

question: How many people can I refer?
answer: User's will get rewards for upto 10 referrals. There is no limit to the referrals if you are a part of the influencer/ campus rep program.

question: How do I join the Influencer Program?
answer: Fill up the form give in the referrals page and we will onboard you if you meet all our criteria.
